description:
This kit contains all the fixings you’ll need to convert a pair of tubeless-ready MTB rims. The biodegradable sealant is a blend of fast-setting latex and variously sized particles that dams punctures up to ¼in. quickly and effectively.

  • Made of biodegradable ingredients
  • Includes 24mm rim tape, valve core tool and 2, 48mm RVC valve stems
  • 226ml bottle of sealant has an injector cap and hose
  • Each half-bottle of sealant adds less than 120g of weight to a wheel
  • Maintains performance at extreme temperatures and altitudes
name: Orange Seal Mountain Tubeless Kit
